search.query: | mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-active" OR metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-opened-rate" OR metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-closed-rate" $env$ $label$ $jolokia_agent_url$ by metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_schema-registry.*) as "*"
| savedsearch telegraf-kafka-schema-registry
dedup env | sort 0 env
search $env$ | dedup label | sort 0 label
search $env$ $label$ | dedup jolokia_agent_url | sort jolokia_agent_url
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-active"
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-opened-rate"
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-closed-rate"
| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jersey-metrics.request-error-rate" $env$ $label$ $jolokia_agent_url$

panel.title: Total number of active Jetty TCP connections (connections-active)

search.query: | mstats avg(_value) prestats=true where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-active" $env$ $label$ $jolokia_agent_url$ by jolokia_agent_url span=10s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` avg(_value) as value by jolokia_agent_url

panel.title: Average rate per second of opened Jetty TCP connections (connections-opened-rate)

| mstats latest(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.master-slave-role.master-slave-role" $env$ $label$ $jolokia_agent_url$ by jolokia_agent_url, metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_schema-registry.*) as "*" by jolokia_agent_url | rename "master-slave-role.master-slave-role" as role | eval role=case(role=0, "slave", role="1", "master") | fields jolokia_agent_url, role | sort 0 jolokia_agent_url

panel.title: schema-registry log events by log_level

search.query: eventtype="kafka_schema_registry" log_level=* [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] | timechart useother=f limit=0 minspan=1m count by log_level

panel.title: Events

search.query: eventtype="kafka_schema_registry" $log_search_tk$ $log_sourcetype_tk$ [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ]

| mstats avg(cpu.usage_iowait) as cpu.usage_iowait, avg(cpu.usage_system) as cpu.usage_system, avg(cpu.usage_user) as cpu.usage_user where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host span=1s | eval cpu.usage=('cpu.usage_iowait'+'cpu.usage_system'+'cpu.usage_user') | stats avg(cpu.usage) AS pct_used | eval pct_used=round(pct_used, 2) | fields pct_used

| mstats avg(mem.used_percent) as avg_usage where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] | eval pct_used=round(avg_usage, 2) | fields pct_used

| mstats latest(disk.used) as disk.used, latest(disk.total) as disk.total where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host, device | stats sum(disk.used) as disk.used, sum(disk.total) as disk.total by host | eval pct_used=round('disk.used'/'disk.total'*100, 2) | stats avg(pct_used) as pct_used | fields pct_used | eval pct_used=round(pct_used, 2)

| mstats avg(cpu.usage_iowait) as cpu.usage_iowait, avg(cpu.usage_system) as cpu.usage_system, avg(cpu.usage_user) as cpu.usage_user where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host span=1s | eval cpu.usage=('cpu.usage_iowait'+'cpu.usage_system'+'cpu.usage_user') | stats avg(cpu.usage) AS pct_used by _time, host | eval pct_used=round(pct_used, 2) | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` limit=40 useother=f avg(pct_used) AS "avg cpu load %" by host

| mstats avg(system.load1) as system.load1 where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] groupby host span=1s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` limit=40 useother=f avg(system.load1) as load_average_1min by host

| mstats avg(mem.used_percent) as mem.used_percent where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host span=1s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` limit=40 useother=f avg(mem.used_percent) AS "mem used (%)" by host

| mstats latest(disk.used) as disk.used, latest(disk.total) as disk.total where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host, path | eval used_pct=round('disk.used'/'disk.total'*100, 2) | eval "disk.total"=round(((('disk.total' / 1024) / 1024) / 1024),2) | rename disk.total as "disk total (GB)" | fields host, path, "disk total (GB)", used_pct | sort 0 host, device

| mstats latest(net.bytes_recv) as bytes_recv_counter, latest(net.bytes_sent) as bytes_sent_counter where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] by host, interface span=1s | streamstats current=f last(*_counter) as "*_prev" by host, interface | eval inbound=((bytes_recv_counter-bytes_recv_prev)/1024), outbound=((bytes_sent_counter-bytes_sent_prev)/1024) | fields _time, host, interface, inbound, outbound | where NOT (inbound<0) AND NOT (outbound<0) | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` limit=40 useother=f avg(inbound) as inbound, avg(outbound) as outbound by host

| mstats latest(diskio.write_bytes) as write_bytes_counter, latest(diskio.read_bytes) as read_bytes_counter where `telegraf_kafka_index` [ | inputlookup kafka_infra_inventory | search role=schema-registry $env$ $label$ | rename name as jolokia_agent_url | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | `extract_jolokia_host` | table host ] name=* by host, name span=1s | streamstats current=f last(*_counter) as "*_prev" by host, name | eval write_bytes=((write_bytes_counter-write_bytes_prev)/10000000), read_bytes=((read_bytes_counter-read_bytes_prev)/10000000) | fields _time, host, name, write_bytes, read_bytes | where NOT (write_bytes<0) AND NOT (read_bytes<0) | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` limit=40 useother=f avg(write_bytes) as write_bytes, avg(read_bytes) as read_bytes by host
